channel.title: How do I upload my auxy songs to Spotify via amuse?

item.title: How do I upload my auxy songs to Spotify via amuse?
item.dc:creator: Maland2016
item.description:
So when you render the songs, tap export, but DON‚ÄôT click Audio. Click the ‚ÄúMore Options‚Äù button or whatever it‚Äôs called, I don‚Äôt remember, but it‚Äôs the last one of the four that show up.

When you hit that, press ‚ÄúUncompressed WAV‚Äù. That will render the file as just that, an uncompressed wav. From there, you can save it to your Drive or Dropbox, etc, etc.

Hopefully this helps!

item.title: How do I upload my auxy songs to Spotify via amuse?
item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
It‚Äôs fairly straightforward. Download amuse, then make sure you have your music (as .wavs) and your artwork (high-quality image, try 1700x1700) on something like Google Drive, Dropbox or iCloud drive. From there, make an account on the app (for free), select New Release and follow the prompts.

Hope this helped!
